page.title: 04EDUCATION-PRIVATE-STATE
page.content: { BURYS COURT PREPARATORY SCHOOL}(BOYS 7 TO 14 YEARS) IS A PRIVATE( FEE PAYING )SCHOOL SENDING BOYS ON TO THE PUBLIC SCHOOLS AND THE REIGATE GRAMMAR SCHOOL BY EXAMINATION, THE COMMON ENTRANCE EXAM. THE SCHOOL IS IN SOUTH EAST OF THE AREA. {LEIGH COUNTY FIRST SCHOOL,}UP TO 8 YEARS OLD, BOYS AND GIRLS,PREPARES PUPILS FOR COUNTY SCHOOLS OUTSIDE THE AREA.THIS VILLAGE SCHOOL SAVED FROM CLOSURE. THERE IS A SCHOOL BUSSING SYSTEM FOR THE OVER-8s.ALSO{BETCHWORTH { ALL CHILDREN}TAKE EXAMS AT 16 YEARS, THE GENERAL CERTIFICATE OF ED OR THE CERTIFICATE OF SECONDARY ED. {MANY CHILDREN CONTINUE ED TO 18 TAKING GCE "A"LEVEL EXAMS {SOME}GO ON TO{TECH COLLEGE OR {UNIVERSITY {ADULT ED}WIDELY SORT AS TOPICS COVER A WIDE RANGE INCL" DO IT YOURSELF"
